casebody.data:
Third District.

The People of the State of Illinois ex rel. Iva Ruth Mahr, appellee, v. Frank A’Hearn, appellant.Gen. No. 8,375.Opinion filed April 22, 1930.W. S. Jewell and Glenn Ratcliff, for appellant. G. Ray Senift, State’s Attorney and Marshall U. Faw, Assistant State’s Attorney, for appellee. Mr. Presiding Justice Eldredge

delivered the opinion of the court.
